project.name: ffa
project.title: Fantasy Free Agent
project.description: An Express/Node REST API and a chrome extension that combines vanilla JS and React. Using data from the Yahoo API, an user can find out if a player is available in their Yahoo baseball league by pressing a keyboard shortcut on any website that contains MLB player names.

project.name: isbt
project.title: Interior Sources
project.description: A small business, static site developed with Gatsby.js. The design is focused on being user friendly, easy to navigate, and quickly digestible.The site provides product examples and an easy to use contact page to request samples and more information in order to get the sales process initiated.

project.name: seasonalSupper
project.title: Seasonal Supper
project.description: Full stack project. React for front-end and a RESTful API constructed with Express/Mongoose/MongoDb. The goal of the project was to provide the user with in season produce for a selected state and month. Selecting an item from the group of produce  provides a list of recipes containing the item as an ingredient.
